name: cargo-messages
description: A streaming reader for JSON messages emitted from Cargo.

scripts.evil-patch-76:x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu: cat node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js | sed -e 's/require(__nccwpck_require.*"index.node")/eval("require")("@cargo-messages\/linux-x64-gnu")/' > node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js.tmp && mv node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js.tmp node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js && chmod 755 node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js
scripts.evil-patch-76:armv7-unknown-linux-gnueab: cat node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js | sed -e 's/require(__nccwpck_require.*"index.node")/eval("require")("@cargo-messages\/linux-arm-gnueabihf")/' > node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js.tmp && mv node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js.tmp node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js && chmod 755 node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js
scripts.evil-patch-76:armv7-linux-androideabi: cat node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js | sed -e 's/require(__nccwpck_require.*"index.node")/eval("require")("@cargo-messages\/android-arm-eabi")/' > node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js.tmp && mv node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js.tmp node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js && chmod 755 node_modules/@neon-rs/cli/index.js
scripts.version: cd npm; for p in *; do cd $p; npm version $npm_package_version --force; cd ..; done

author: David Herman <david.herman@gmail.com>
